mdx.rawBody:
---
Song: ATHu mEttilE
Film: ponnumaNi
---
Notes: s r2 g3 m1 p d2 n2 S

ATHu mEttilE muTHam oNNu koduTHA moTHa kadan theerAdhu
sr   rm m m  g m    g r  r s s   r g   g r   rs  sr rsn3.

kATHu vAkkilE kaNNadiCHu kavuTHA ketta manam sE..rAdhu
s r   rm m m  p  d p m   g r rs  r  g2 r s   rg2 rss

patti thotti pakkamellAm love love love'ACHu
g  p  p   d  g  p p  d   g pn d p  g    g2g

katti vaCHa kattavundhu iCHu iCHu kiss'ACHu
g  p  p d   g  p p  d   gpn  dp   m    gr

Stanza:
vetti kadhayilE veeram koraiyala veeN pECHu yEn mAnE 
p  p  p p  p p  p  p   p p  p pS nSn  d p   p   p S

thatti kEttida kitta ALillA nee oNNu thA mAnE
p   p  p  p p  p  p  pp  pS gpS n3p  dn3 dpp

kattAndharayilE kattil irukkudhu kA..THAda vA mAmA 
p  p  p  p p p  p  p   pp  p pS  nSn d  p  p  p S

katti pudiCHukkO vattam adiCHukkO kEp..pAru yAr mAmA 
p  p  p p p   p  p  p   pp p   pS gpS  n3p  dn3 dpp

veTHalaiya pOttu  pOttu muTHakkarai nee pO..da 
p d  S  n3 pd Sn3 pdSn3 p d   R S   n3  dn3 pdp

niTHam adha pAThu pATHu piTHaTHula nee A...da 
p d    Sn3  pdSn3 pdSn3 p d  R  S  n3  dn3 pdn3dp

(patti thotti...) 
(ATHu mEttilE...)

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
kAttu kuyiloNNu gAnam padikkidhu nee kEtka vA mAmA 
yEttil irukkira pAdam pudikkala nee pEsa vA mAmA 
mAman veraippilE meesai murukkunA thAngAdhu un dhEgam 
yEdhO kaNakkula nAnum thavikkirEn yEn innum sandhEgam 
vetkam enna vittu vittu romba thooram pOgAdhA
paCHarisi aCHu vellam reNdum oNNA sErAdhA 
(patti thotti...) 
(ATHu mEttilE...)
